event.title: Free Software policy in Europe - University of Trento

body.p: At a seminar (it) held in the Faculty of Sociology of the University of Trento, Italy, FSFE's president Karsten Gerloff will discuss policy issues relating to Free Software and Open Standards in Europe and around the world. His talk will take place Room 9, from 4pm. to 6pm. The event is open to the public.
